project.name: Netty
project.description: Netty is an asynchronous event-driven network application framework for rapid development of maintainable high performance protocol servers and clients.

item.justification: The com.barchart.udt library exposes this class in their API, but slf4j is an optional dependency to Netty.
The com.barchart.udt library exposes this class in their API, but slf4j is an optional dependency to Netty.
They're not "external classes" if they're from a Netty package.
This should be test-only, and we're removing support for JUnit 4.

group.title: Central interface for all I/O operations
